rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space integrated with foyer elements and adherence to Vastu principles for positive energy. Ensures directional alignment.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area designed as the main living space, featuring colonial design aesthetics and natural lighting. Placement follows Vastu with south-eastern exposure.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with ample storage and workspace. Positioned according to local building norms and Vastu guidelines for food preparation area, ideally in the northeast direction.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: Designated as a split-level studio apartment within the ground floor. Colonial architecture influences with open plan layout and dual function living/dining area, ensuring privacy while meeting joint family needs.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A cozy guest room that adheres to Vastu by placing it in a favorable direction for guests. Provides adequate space and natural light.

rooms.name: Utility Area
rooms.description: Consists of laundry, storage, and a pantry area. Placed according to local regulations and Vastu for functionality and convenience.

openings.description: Provides access to a two-car garage.
Large windows across living and studio areas for natural light; designed with colonial style decorative trims.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom emphasizing privacy and relaxation. Colonial design details are incorporated along with Vastu recommendations for a harmonious sleep environment.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two additional bedrooms to accommodate joint family members, ensuring personal space while adhering to Vastu and local norms. Each is designed to be well-ventilated and naturally lit.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater space with acoustics optimized for entertainment. Colonial design elements integrate modern technology, located away from the main living area to reduce disturbance.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: A shared balcony space for relaxation and views. Designed with colonial elements and Vastu recommendations ensuring proper alignment with the home.

openings.description: Climbing stairs connecting ground to upper floor, designed following safety standards and local building norms.
